turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order four small pizzas from Bella Luna, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Small, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For one pizza, can I get a Hawaiian pizza with extra pineapple?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Another Can I get a Meat Lover's pizza with extra bacon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third one, can I get a Supreme Pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the last one can I get a three-cheese steak pizza, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, they do not serve Philly cheese steak pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Can I get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Buffalo Chicken pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a gluten-free crust, please, for all four of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. so, 4 small pizzas. a Hawaiian with extra pineapple, a Meat Lover's with extra bacon, a Supreme and a Buffalo Chicken pizza. gluten-free crust on all 4.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your total will be $49.87.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bella Luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, enjoy!
